data.text:
Design n animate 2d game asset character

Hi We''ll do sprite sheet of characters for your android games and also for any purpose of you need. PACKAGE DETAIL -COOL PACKAGE (BASIC) We will RIG your character if you already have the design character or make a sketch for your character (1 Animation Idle) -AWESOME PACKAGE (STANDRAD) ? We will draw BASE CHARACTER or make 3 simple animations (You can choose optional) -SHOWTIME PACKAGE (PREMIUM) ? We will make BASE CHARACTER + 3 SIMPLE ANIMATION of your character (Base Character + 3 Animation... View more

Game Art

Attention! Prior to purchasing, please send me a message so we can discuss prices, the quantity of sprites, and animations needed. Hey there! With a decade of experience crafting sprites, I''ve delved into indie video games, Mugen characters, and graphic designs. Whether it''s pixel art sprites for your video game, Twitch, YouTube streams, or web pages, count on me to assist you. My expertise lies in fighting games, RPGs, and platformers. Whether you''re after a single sprite or a comprehensive an... View more

Anime (Danganronpa) style sprites

I can draw half-body, full-body sprites in basic or different poses, either Danganronpa 1-2 or V3 style! I can draw any design of the character except nudidity. If you don't a finished character, you can send me different references and I will combine them and deliver the finished product to you! If you're not satisfied with something during the proccess, please tell me! You can use the sprites for your games or commercial use. View more

Pixel Art for Game Asset, Sprites

Hi, do you need sprites for your game? In top-down or isometric style? I got it. Or do you simply need characters in detailed pixel art? Or even a background? You've come to the right place then! I can help you to create game assets, pixel characters, and anything pixel-related! You can see the price above is for a single artwork and I can give you a special price for batch orders or sprites. Feel free to message me to discuss the project! View more

Graphic Design - web, print, and layout

I am experienced in all aspects of graphic design and love to keep my skills sharp all-around and learn new things. I offer graphic editing/resizing, web graphics, print and merchandise graphics, logo design, and layouts for all types of media from DVD cases to magazines. I use Adobe software - InDesign and Photoshop but am also familiar with basic paint tools and Krita. I prefer to work with nonprofits, arts & entertainment (to which I offer discounts for financial need) but I am open to anyth... View more

Pixel Art

Have a person with a passion and experience in Pixel Art design make a custom artwork especially for your illustration, avatars, games and more! Anything you can conceive I will help you create. I adapt to your preferred style from examples or have me create a design especially for you. Please contact me for any custom orders and remember "The only limit to Art is the depths of your imagination." View more

How Sprites Experts Can Help You

Sprites refers to the combination of individual object of computer hardware. Sprites are used in the preparation of scan lines for video output devices. Sprite is mainly used in computer designs such as CRT. It is a computer graphic which can be utilized or manipulated as a single entity. It is now basically referred to as a part of graphic displays which involves the use of a two dimensional bitmap. Sprites are used in the hobbyist community as a tool for combining different smaller images into a single bitmap in order to save memory. Hiring freelance Sprites experts can be done on Guru.

Sprite can be used to reduce the number of image load in design and therefore reduces the problems that arises as a result of website trafficking. It saves time by relatively merging all different images into one. It makes the location of images easy for editing instead of flipping through files to locate what is being searched for. The adoption and usage of sprite helps cut back on the HTTP requests. When customers visit a business website, sprites help to reduce the amount of load time. It is a step forward in providing the user with more flexibility with regards to dealing with websites and it helps in designing websites and bar layouts. Hiring a freelancer with Sprite knowledge can be done on Guru. Find the pro you need today.
